Package com.epam.esm.controller

Class CertificateController

java.lang.Object
com.epam.esm.controller.CertificateController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/certificates") public class CertificateController extends Object
Controller class for handling requests related to certificates.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping public Response getAll()
      Method for handling GET requests to retrieve all certificates.
      Returns:
      a Response object containing the list of all CertificateDtos or a NOT_FOUND status if no certificates are found.

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Response getById(@PathVariable long id)
      Retrieves certificate by ID
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the certificate to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Response object containing the certificate or an error message if none found

    • getByTag

      @PostMapping("/byTag") public Response getByTag(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid com.epam.esm.dto.TagDto tag, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Retrieves certificates by tag
      Parameters:
      tag - TagDto object containing the tag name to filter by
      bindingResult - BindingResult object containing any validation errors
      Returns:
      Response object containing the list of certificates or an error message if none found

    • getBySearchFilter

      @PostMapping("/search") public Response getBySearchFilter(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid com.epam.esm.dto.SearchFilterDto searchFilter, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Retrieves certificates by search filter
      Parameters:
      searchFilter - SearchFilterDto object containing the search filter parameters
      bindingResult - BindingResult object containing any validation errors
      Returns:
      Response object containing the list of certificates or an error message if none found

    • getBySortFilter

      @PostMapping("/sort") public Response getBySortFilter(@RequestBody com.epam.esm.dto.SortFilterDto sortFilter, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Retrieve certificates by sort filter.
      Parameters:
      sortFilter - The sort and filter options.
      bindingResult - The result of validating the input.
      Returns:
      A response containing the retrieved certificates.

    • create

      @PostMapping public Response create(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid com.epam.esm.dto.CertificateDto certificate, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Create a new certificate.
      Parameters:
      certificate - The certificate to create.
      bindingResult - The result of validating the input.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.

    • edit

      @PatchMapping public Response edit(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid com.epam.esm.dto.CertificateDto certificate, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Update an existing certificate.
      Parameters:
      certificate - The updated certificate.
      bindingResult - The result of validating the input.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.

    • deleteById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public Response deleteById(@PathVariable long id)
      Delete a certificate by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the certificate to delete.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.
